General.Name: S.E. Power Limited
General.Description: Sampann Utpadan India Limited manufactures and sells reclaimed rubber products in India. It offers crumb, whole tyre, and butyl reclaim rubber, as well as bead wire, cut wire, and steel cut wire shots. The company also engages in the generation of power from wind energy source. The company was formerly known as S. E. Power Limited and changed its name to Sampann Utpadan India Limited in July 2023. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Vadodara, India.
